description: Source code for a web-based database viewer user interface, including HTML structure, embedded CSS styles, and JavaScript logic for data fetching and dynamic UI behaviors.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of available databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list manually, resets current selections, and updates the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses a database to show its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads tables for a selected database and displays them.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a selected table and displays it in tabular form.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Creates HTML for displaying fetched table data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates HTML for individual table cell content, handling nulls, objects, and long strings.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses a cell to show full content or truncated preview.
